name: part_013
file: tmp_【3D Live】Let My Voice Enchant You Tonight! #3DKobornDay2025 [jNCGOv8Zz1A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru performs 'Finale' by ZUTOMAYO as the closing song of her 3D Live.
Closing MC section. Kobo expresses her gratitude to the viewers and her senior Vestia Zeta, then says her final goodbyes.

subtitles.original: フィナーレ
subtitles.english: Finale

subtitles.original: たとえば Happy End より
subtitles.english: For example, more than a Happy End

subtitles.original: 甘くて豪華なデザートより
subtitles.english: More than a sweet and luxurious dessert

subtitles.original: 君がいいんだよ
subtitles.english: It's you that I want

subtitles.original: 二つの傘より相合傘
subtitles.english: More than two umbrellas, sharing one

subtitles.original: ちょっと冷たいけど愛するための
subtitles.english: It's a bit cold, but if it's the price

subtitles.original: 代償ならいくらでもどうぞ
subtitles.english: To love you, then take as much as you want

subtitles.original: ただずっとそばにいたい
subtitles.english: I just want to be by your side forever

subtitles.original: ねぇ誰を欲しがったって問題ない
subtitles.english: Hey, no matter who you want, it's not a problem

subtitles.original: 二人ぼっちのセカイでずっと
subtitles.english: In this world where it's just the two of us, forever

subtitles.original: 最後の花火を上げて フィナーレを飾って
subtitles.english: Light up the final fireworks and decorate the finale

subtitles.original: 奇跡の降る恋に落ちて
subtitles.english: Fall into a love where miracles fall

subtitles.original: 誰も離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let anyone go

subtitles.original: 味気ないセカイも悪くないね
subtitles.english: A tasteless world isn't so bad either

subtitles.original: どんなに恋をしたって出会えないよきっと
subtitles.english: No matter how much you love, we'll surely never meet again

subtitles.original: 終わりもない 幸せにキスをしよう
subtitles.english: Let's kiss our never-ending happiness

subtitles.original: いつか今日を忘れても
subtitles.english: Even if I forget today one day

subtitles.original: 君がいいんだよ
subtitles.english: It's you that I want

subtitles.original: 土砂降りの日 愛おしく初めて目が合った
subtitles.english: On a day of pouring rain, we lovingly met eyes for the first time

subtitles.original: ずっと 覚えておくよ
subtitles.english: I'll remember it forever

subtitles.original: ねぇ誰を欲しがったって問題ない
subtitles.english: Hey, no matter who you want, it's not a problem

subtitles.original: 二人ぼっちのセカイでずっと
subtitles.english: In this world where it's just the two of us, forever

subtitles.original: 最後の花火を上げて フィナーレを誓って
subtitles.english: Light up the final fireworks and vow for the finale

subtitles.original: 奇跡の降る恋に落ちて
subtitles.english: Fall into a love where miracles fall

subtitles.original: 誰も離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let anyone go

subtitles.original: 素っ気ないセカイも悪くないね
subtitles.english: A cold world isn't so bad either

subtitles.original: どんなに恋をしたって忘れられないよきっと
subtitles.english: No matter how much you love, I'll surely never forget

subtitles.original: 終わりもない 幸せにキスをしよう
subtitles.english: Let's kiss our never-ending happiness

subtitles.original: 味気ないね
subtitles.english: It's tasteless, isn't it?

subtitles.original: でもそれがね
subtitles.english: But you know, that is

subtitles.original: 二人の幸せ
subtitles.english: Our happiness

subtitles.original: Oh my God, I almost cried.
subtitles.english: Oh my God, I almost cried.

subtitles.original: I almost cried singing this song.
subtitles.english: I almost cried singing this song.

subtitles.original: Thank you for today, guys!
subtitles.english: Thank you for today, guys!

subtitles.original: Thank you for today!
subtitles.english: Thank you for today!

subtitles.original: Thank you for watching until the end.
subtitles.english: Thank you for watching until the end.

subtitles.original: And thank you for Zeta-senpai because she covered this finale song first...
subtitles.english: And thank you for Zeta-senpai because she covered this finale song first...

subtitles.original: ...and then I was inspired, so yeah.
subtitles.english: ...and then I was inspired, so yeah.

subtitles.original: Aku bolak-balik dengerin ini terus, hehehe.
subtitles.english: I kept listening to this over and over, hehehe.

subtitles.original: いやいや、今日は来てくれて
subtitles.english: No no, thank you for coming today

subtitles.original: 最後まで見てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: and thank you for watching until the end!

subtitles.original: I hope you guys enjoy all the performance...
subtitles.english: I hope you guys enjoy all the performance...

subtitles.original: ...um, yeah, this whole stream.
subtitles.english: ...um, yeah, this whole stream.

subtitles.original: みんな大好き！
subtitles.english: I love you all!

subtitles.original: Thank you for your birthday wishes.
subtitles.english: Thank you for your birthday wishes.

subtitles.original: 後で読んであげますね。
subtitles.english: I'll read them later.

subtitles.original: Bye bye, minna!
subtitles.english: Bye bye, everyone!

subtitles.original: No more encore! No more encore!
subtitles.english: No more encore! No more encore!

subtitles.original: Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: ボコボコバ、こぼ・かなえる at your service.
subtitles.english: Bokoboko ba, Kobo Kanaeru at your service.

subtitles.original: Let me be your sun to shine your day!
subtitles.english: Let me be your sun to shine your day!

subtitles.original: Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye!
